options.name: Modern Minimalist Upgrade
options.description: Maintaining minimalist style, selecting a beige fabric sofa with smoother lines, enhancing overall texture
options.imagePrompt: In this room photo, keep the walls, floor, and all other furniture completely unchanged. Step 1: Remove and completely eliminate the old sofa in the center position, restoring that area to clean floor and wall. Step 2: Precisely place a modern minimalist beige fabric sofa (200×90×80cm) at the original sofa location, featuring knitted fabric and solid wood legs, with smooth and clean lines, ensuring lighting and shadows are consistent with the room environment.

options.name: Luxury Style Transformation
options.description: Bold attempt at luxury style, gray leather sofa with metal legs, elevating the space's sophistication
options.imagePrompt: In this room photo, keep the walls, floor, and all other furniture completely unchanged. Step 1: Remove and completely eliminate the old sofa in the center position, restoring that area to clean floor and wall. Step 2: Precisely place a luxury-style gray leather sofa (205×92×82cm) at the original sofa location, featuring genuine leather and metal legs with elegant lines, ensuring lighting and shadows are consistent with the room environment.
